synopsis.text: Ikki Tousen takes place in modern-day Japan, where rival high schools battle for supremacy. The story loosely parallels the historic Romance of the Three Kingdoms conflict in ancient China. The three most powerful schools are Kyosho Academy, led by Sousou Moutoku; Nanyo Academy, led by Sonsaku Hakufu; and Seito High School, led by Ryuubi Gentoku. The leaders of these schools possess mystical powers tied to sacred magatama jewels and the spirits of ancient warriors. They are known as "Toushi" - reincarnated fighters with the ambition to conquer and achieve their fated destinies. A central struggle revolves around a mysterious Dragon Orb artifact that can amplify the toushi's powers. Various factions, including Moutoku, Hakufu, and Ryomou, seek control of the orb for their own ends. However, the orb also makes the toushi more susceptible to losing control of their raging inner dragon spirits. As the schools battle and make alliances in pursuit of dominance, the toushi leaders struggle to master their growing powers before their inner dragons consume them. The fate of the schools hangs in the balance as the characters vie to shape their destinies against the backdrop of reincarnated conflict spanning over 1800 years.
